channel.title: Words and things that you hate that others say/use on the internet
channel.description:
Well I hate the word noob, nub, froob ect. I also hate the word "wat" that people use sometimes but mostly on RuneScape, it doesn't even sound like "what" or why don't they just use "wut" atleast lol. Uhh, another thing I hate is spamming and flaming.
Ok so basicly just post things you hate on the internet like words people use, what people do, things that pop up or something.

item.title: Words and things that you hate that others say/use on the internet
item.dc:creator: @OnlyOneRule OnlyOneRule
item.description:
@OnlyOneRule wrote:

i hate all nerd words… heres some ive come across

  1. all forms of newbie (knob is allowed as in your penis…)
    noob
    n00b
    no0b
    n0ob
    newb
    n3wb
    neeb
    n33b
    n3b
    nuub
    nub (i used to use this, thought it meant knob…)
    naab
    n44b
    na4b
    n4ab
    nabbl
    naabli3 (wtf)
    nab
    n4b
    kn00b (used by some really weird guy i was chating to)
    froob
    fr00b
    fr000000000000000000000000000000000b (counted em 1 by 1 when some guy called me it on runsecape)
    fr0ob
    frooob
    frob
    fr0b
    choob
    ch00b
    ch0ob
    cho0b
    chob
    chb
    Ch Ch Ch Ch ChoooOOOooobe!
    chwb
    chwoobie
    choobie
    choob
    choobie
    choobz
    choobs
    ch00bs
    ch00by
    newby

  2. all forms of stupid words that meen its good
    1337
    l33t
    leet
    lee7
    l3et
    le3t
    1eet
    1e3t
    owned
    0wned
    own3d
    0wn3d
    pwnd (im wehosted lol)
    pwnd
    pwn3d
    pwund
    pw0nd
    pwond
    poond
    p00nd
    po0nd
    p0ond
    pnd
    pwoondeded
    hax0r3d (just use hacked please!!!)
    h4x0r3d
    hax0red
    h4xored
    haxored
    haxores
    hxrd
    haxed
    hacksd
    haxored
    hacksored
    hacksd
    hackzd
    crakzd
    cr4ckd
    cr4ckz
    lel
    l3l
    woot
    w0ot
    wo0t
    w33t
    weet
    woet
    wooht
    w0ht

item.title: Words and things that you hate that others say/use on the internet
item.dc:creator: @xxlegitxx xxlegitxx
item.description:
@xxlegitxx wrote:

[quote=“Frell, post:41, topic:121631”]I try to tell people ‘nub’ (nuh-uh-b) does not sound like ‘noob’ (n-u-u-b)

and then they reply

“so wat nub”.[/quote]

Yea, it’s pretty obvious its pronounced ‘nuhb,’ as opposed to ‘noob.’

Read full topic

i hate when people say ‘nub’ in RS and really think it sounds like ‘noob’

Someone told me that was the end of your wrists after your hand was cut off, so I just go by that and think of anyone who says it as a moron :D.

item.title: Words and things that you hate that others say/use on the internet
item.dc:creator: @gothic_queen casey.
item.description:
@gothic_queen wrote:

i·ron·ic /aɪˈrɒnɪk/ Pronunciation Key - Show Spelled Pronunciation[ahy-ron-ik] Pronunciation Key - Show IPA Pronunciation –adjective 1. containing or exemplifying irony: an ironic novel; an ironic remark. 2. ironical. 3. coincidental; unexpected: It was ironic that I was seated next to my ex-husband at the dinner.

Source:
Here

item.description:
@xxlegitxx wrote:

moparsc4p3:

Ironic?

You hate people who use numbers instead of letters. Yet you use numbers in your name. That’s what Evil_ was trying to say. That is ironic.

item.dc:creator: @Lin Lin
item.description:
@Lin wrote:

[quote=“afi, post:22, topic:121631”]Improper grammar mostly.[/quote]Totally agreed

I hate it when people use short words like these.
[#]U
[#]R
[#]Y
And others. I also hate these.
[#]Lawl
[#]Lel
[#]Roflmfao (Because it’s just gay)
And that’s about it ^.^

noob

13375p34k
and finally, Casey.[/quote]

wow you noob you /fail. lulz, u choob wanna be like l3l and us. 13375p34k is beyond you. lel… you froob you should stfu and GTFo.

I just play, det was annoying. I hate it when people say Moparscape, and lmao.
